en.text: In Scale, in a prestigious location, we offer an exceptional villa by the sea with an area of â€‹â€‹approximately 200 mÂ², divided into two floors.
en.textInfo1:
Ground floor: 
   â€¢ Spacious and bright living room, ideal for moments of rest 
 â€¢ Large, fully equipped kitchen 
 â€¢ Main bathroom 
 â€¢ Main bedroom with private bathroom
en.textInfo2:
Upper floor: 
 â€¢ Two double bedrooms with a common balcony with a wonderful sea view 
 â€¢ One of the bedrooms has its own bathroom 
 â€¢ Two smaller bedrooms, ideal for guests or children 
 â€¢ Another bathroom with a hallway
en.textInfo3:
Exterior: 
 The villa is surrounded by a large private garden that offers a perfect facilities for the open -air rest. 
 Carefully maintained green areas create a quiet and harmonious atmosphere. There is also a private parking space directly on the area.
en.textInfo4:
Direct access to the sea: 
 One of the greatest attractions of this villa is a private access to the sea - a comfortable pedestrian path leads directly to a private beach located directly below the villa. 
 This property is therefore a perfect choice for those who want to enjoy the sea every day.
en.textInfo5:
Localities: 
 The villa is located in an exclusive and panoramic area, just 1.5 km from the center of Scalea. 
 This property represents a unique opportunity for those looking for luxury housing by the sea or an attractive investment. It offers privacy, comfort and perfect contact with nature.

en.text: For sale in Diamante (CS) we offer a beautiful separate villa designed for housing
en.textInfo:
With four rooms and once a bathroom - ideal for those looking for a quiet and private environment. The property is spread on one floor with a total area of â€‹â€‹115 mÂ² and is fully furnished. On the ground floor there is a garage, which can be adjusted to the second residential unit.
The main entrance leads to a spacious double living room, which is equipped with a cozy fireplace - ideal for winter evenings. Separate, bright and fully equipped kitchen provides all comfort for preparing tasty meals that you can enjoy in a circle of family or friends.
The villa offers two spacious and well -lighted bedrooms that ensure maximum comfort and relaxation. There are also two balconies with panoramic sea views and the surrounding greenery - an ideal place for moments of relaxation in the fresh air.
The private garden with an orchard of 3500 mÂ² is carefully maintained and provides a perfect environment for rest in complete privacy. The property also includes a garage that offers comfortable parking.
The villa is currently free and ready for immediate move in. This is the ideal solution for those looking for quiet and private housing, yet close to all important services and main transport routes.
The price is final and includes all costs associated with the acquisition of real estate.
Do not miss this fantastic opportunity to buy a separate villa with all the necessary comforts for life in complete comfort and peace. Contact us to arrange a tour and see for yourself all the qualities of this amazing property.

en.text: For sale - a beautiful detached house on two floors in Scalea, Calabria.
en.textInfo:
This spacious property is located on a large plot of 800 mÂ² and is ideal for a large family or as a holiday house for nature lovers. Part of the land is a beautiful olive orchard in perfect condition, which creates a unique Mediterranean atmosphere.
The house has a total living area of â€‹â€‹180 mÂ² and offers four spacious bedrooms. The property is intended for reconstruction, which gives the future owner a great opportunity to create a house or country house according to his own ideas.
The layout includes a large living room with a functional fireplace, kitchen, three bathrooms and practical storage space. Garage for two cars ensures comfortable parking, while the terrace offers a breathtaking view of the surrounding mountains.
The perfect choice for those who want to live in nature and be just a few kilometers from the sea. Within walking distance you will find restaurants, beaches, bars and other services.
Price: 183 000 euros - final price including all fees, legal services and real estate transfer taxes.
Do not hesitate to contact us for more information and arrange a tour!
